dmca.title: Gold-maker Demands Removal of Infringing Material
dmca.body:
GOLDENMINE.COM
[Private] 
Los Angeles, CA 90014 
Tel: [Private] 
Fax: [Private] 
TO:	From: [Private] 
Fax:	Pages: 3 pgs.
Phone:	Date: 3/30/05
Re:	DMCA Complaint	

Attn: DMCA Complaints

Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed.
The content of 14k-gold-chains.com and GoldenMine.com have been infringed and reproduced without permission. We have asked the website owner to remove the infringing content, without avail.
Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above. FOR WEB SEARCH, YOU MUST IDENTIFY EACH SEARCH RESULT THAT DIRECTLY LINKS TO A WEB PAGE THAT ALLEGEDLY CONTAINS INFRINGING MATERIAL. This requires you to provide (a) the search query that you used, and
(b) the URL for each allegedly infringing search result. (Note that the URL for each search result appears in green at the end of the description for that search result.)


a)Google "If you are looking for a large selection of 14k gold chains"
b) www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/gold-chains.htm www.sarraf.com/catalog/white-gold-chain.htm 
www.sarraf.com/catalog/gold-chain.htm


Google "length from children's thin box chains for pendants to men's thick diamond cut ropes"


www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/italian-gold-chain.htm
a)Google "We carry white gold chains in many styles including ball, snake, micro link and more"


b) www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/white_gold_chains.htm , www.citijewel.com/htm-cat/white_gold_chains.htm 

a)Google "daughter or son's graduation, a wedding anniversary or a loved one's birthday,"
b) www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/white_gold_chains.htm , www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/wholesale_jewelry.htm , www.citijewel.com/htm-cat/white_gold_chains.htm


a)Google "special charm to add to your personal accessories collection) "
b) www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/gold-charm.htm
a)Google "different occasions and events, including sports, animals"


b) www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/gold-charms.htm , www.citijewel.com/htm-cat/gold-charms.htm


a)Google "layer of polish will wear off in time and the yellow coloring will slowly emerge"


b) www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/what_is_white_gold.htm , www.citijewel.com/htm-cat/what_is_white_gold.htm


Google "featured lovely fancy Byzantine necklaces selling at discounted"


www.citijewel.com/htm-cat/bvzantine_necklaces.htm


a)Google "both even byzantine necklaces, or graduated ones for a more stylish look"
b) www.citijewel.com/htm-cat/byzantine_necklace.htm , http://www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/byzantine_necklace.htm
a)Google most of our chains can be custom sized to different lengths, just call "
b) www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/women_s_chains.htm ,
a)Google "Figaro chains have the classic 3 +1 design. Our lengths come in"
b) www.sarraf.com/htm-cat/gold_figaro_chains.htm
Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact you (email address is preferred). brianree@goldenmine.com , 213-629-1375
Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material (email address is preferred).
sales@sarraf.com , sarraf@sarraf.com
5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sign the paper.
Send the written communication to the following address:
Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints 
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
OR fax to:
[Private] 
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
